full_summary:
**Tender for FTIR Handheld Spectrometer with Specific Software and Accessories**

**Solicitation Number:** 2023-15318
**Annual Procurement Quantity:** 2
**Duration of Contract:** From contract award date to March 31, 2023
**delivery Date:** From contract award date to March 31, 2023

**Description:**
The Government of Canada intends to engage a supplier for the provision of one or more FTIR handheld spectrometers, specific software, and accessories. The Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC) is seeking a supplier able to provide high-quality, laboratory-usable equipment.

**Eligibility:**
Only suppliers holding a valid Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services, and Supplies from Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) are eligible to submit a bid. Suppliers who do not hold this arrangement may download the solicitation document and submit a response to become pre-qualified.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
The evaluation criteria for this solicitation include:

* Price
* Mandatory technical criteria

**Selection Process:**
The supplier who meets the mandatory technical criteria and submits the lowest aggregate price will be recommended for contract award.

**Trade Agreements:**
This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

**Contact Information:**
For more information, please contact:

* Marie-claude Rose
* Contact Person
* Defence Research and Development Canada
* 2459 route de la Bravoure
* Québec, Quebec (G3J 1X5)
* Phone: 418 844-4000
* Email: [marie-claude.rose@forces.gc.ca](mailto:marie-claude.rose@forces.gc.ca) {.Email}

**Closing Date:** Please refer to the solicitation documents for the closing date.
